name: King's Quest 3 Redux: To Heir Is Human
name_original: King's Quest 3 Redux: To Heir Is Human
description:
King's Quest 3 Redux: To Heir Is Human is an adventure game developed by AGDInteractive. It came out on 24-02-2011. It was published by AGDInteractive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
King's Quest 3 Redux: To Heir Is Human is available on PC.
